other_tests.findings: Mild atelectasis at the right lung base. Minimal signal drop off on out-of-phase imaging suggesting mild fatty deposition in the liver. A 6 mm enhancing lesion in the right hepatic lobe, likely a nonspecific perfusional difference. Stones and sludge filling the gallbladder with slight edema of the gallbladder wall. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilatation or evidence of biliary stones. Very mild fat stranding anterior to the pancreas, pancreatic duct not dilated, no stones in the pancreatic duct. Adrenal glands unremarkable, spleen normal, kidneys without evidence of hydronephrosis or masses. Visualized parts of stomach, small, and large bowel are within normal limits, no free fluid or lymphadenopathy.
